title: Westminister Bridge
address: Westminster Bridge, London, Greater London, SW1A 2JH
desc: The neo-Gothic Westminster Bridge connects Lambeth and Westminster. Though popular for its panoramic views, the Victorian bridge’s decorative details and cultural importance make it an attraction in its own right.

title: Bali, Indonesia
desc: Bali packs a lot into one small island—from breathtaking waterfalls like Sekumpul in the north to the white sand beaches of Nyang Nyang in the south.

title: Snowy Mountains, Thailand
address: Khiri Nakhon 8/1 Alley, Huai Kapi, Chonburi 20000 Thailand
desc: An abandoned stone and gravel quarry filled with water that appears to be snow-covered due to the white peaks around it.

title: Beautiful Sunrise, Thailand
desc: Doi Inthanon, the highest peak in Thailand at 2,565 meters, offers one of the most spectacular sunrise experiences in the country.

title: Nusa Pendia Bali, Indonesia
desc: The coral reefs around Nusa Penida are well maintained and house some of the most unique sea creatures in the world.

title: Cherry Blossoms Spring
desc: Cherry blossoms are a symbol of Japan's history and philosophies, and are celebrated with centuries-old traditions.

title: Holmen Lofoten, France
desc: Serpentine roads, wild fjords, colourful cottage houses, sparkling blue waters and jutting mountaintops.

title: The Shikara
desc: The shikara is a type of wooden boat found on Dal Lake and other water bodies of Srinagar in Jammu and Kashmir.

title: Hohenzollern Bridge
desc: A famous bridge in Cologne, Germany, known for its love locks and scenic views.

title: Santorini
desc: Famous for its stunning whitewashed buildings and blue-domed churches.

title: Halaeiwa
desc: A beautiful seaside town in Hawaii, known for its surf culture and relaxed vibe.

title: Eiffel Tower
desc: One of the most iconic landmarks in the world, the Eiffel Tower stands tall in Paris.
